Upon casting and at the beginning of each turn for the spellâ€™s duration, you must consume a Common or rarer item or component. Upon doing so, the creature regains Xd12 DHP. This spell cannot force a creature to regain more than 25 DHP, and ends if you fail to consume an item or component.
